datum: Kyrie eleison. Christe eleison. Kyrie eleison.
I am the mother of fair love, + and fear, and knowledge, * and holy hope.
V. Pray for us, O holy Mother of God.
R. That we may be made worthy of the promises of Christ.
We take refuge under Thy protectionm * O holy Mother of God! Despise not our supplications in our need, but deliver us alway from all dangers, O Virgin, glorious and blessed!
Lord, we pray Thee, that the glorious intercession of Mary, blessed, and glorious, and everlastingly Virgin, may shield us and bring us on toward eternal life.
Hail, Mary, full of grace. * The Lord is with Thee!
